price: 30. (Al-lah) les dará su recompensa y aumentará Su favor sobre ellos. Él es realmente Indulgente y Agradecido.
arabic: لِيُوَفِّيَهُمۡ أُجُورَهُمۡ وَيَزِيدَهُم مِّن فَضۡلِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ غَفُورٞ شَكُورٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: liyuwaffiyahum ujūrahum wayazīdahum min faḍlihi innahu ghafūrun shakūrun
translations: That He may give them in full
